Text:
Something wrong with the video

heres a shot captured http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/7206/vlcsnap2010050914h49m11.png

theres a black bar only at the bottom. And the hardcoded subtitles are placed in a strange way like u see in the above snapshot.

Cant watch it like this, too bad. Downloading an other torrent
action123: I made it work by toying around a bit with the crop & aspect settings in VLC. The text is still a bit chopped off on the bottom, but it is readable.
yes, this is cropped wrong. get another copy.
Agree with previous comments, very strange cropping, subs hardcoded on black bottom of the screen...

Have no idea why this is the most popular/seeded 400 blows torrent. The quality is pretty bad, it's not a rip of the Criterion, the hardcoded subs are way below the picture in the bottom letterbox area (explaining the weird crop necessary to have them appear, since the top letterbox is cropped), and it's a larger file than the other one. Avoid.
